activities: Passkey provides software to the hospitality industry for housing related to group meetings.  Individual attendees provide certain personal information, including credit card data, as part of the registration process.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, address, phone number, email address, credit card number and credit card expiration date
recoursemech: We have engaged BBB EU Safe Harbor as an arbiter for dispute resolution.
